resources.string: 1. The create and edit outfit phases have been improved.
This application has been developed by AGBA Android Apps.
The application is in beta, if you have any problems using the application or any error, please send us an mail to the following address:
Please, send us your suggestions to improve the application. Thank you very much.
Know our body type is very important for our image. You can choose the clothes that best suits you, hide flaws and highlight strengths.

We can summarize the most common shapes in 5 groups. Observe carefully yourself in the mirror, then click on the image of the silhouette that best matches you, and you will discover some tips on how to carefully choose each garment and accessories to improve your image
As our eye color, skin and hair, there are certain colors in the palette that favor us more than others. When we talk about this we refer only to the colors that are in contact with the face.
One of the classic studies of the colometry is the study of colors through the seasons. To find your station, you need to observe in the mirror without makeup.

It is vital that light is natural to observe well your skin. If you tend toward yellow or gold, you have a warm skin tone. If instead tends toward the pink or reddish tone of your skin it is cold. Once you locate your skin type, scans between stations to discover yours and click to find out what colors suit you.

Skin: Pale as porcelain, with a pink or slightly bluish, but overall it is clear complexion.
Eyes: Dark brown, gray, blue or deep green. The eye color contrasts sharply with the white of the eyes.

Your colors: bright, primary, intense and bright colors. Pure white, black, navy blue, emerald green, deep hot pink, red, royal shiny burgundy, charcoal gray, black, electric blue, fuchsia and royal blue.
Never use the colors: Orange, beige and brown
Hair: Usually blond or light brown hair.
Your colors: Use cold and soft colors (pink, blue, green and gray), pastels, neutral shades of pink and blue (blue-gray including Navy), the grayish beige, brown, lavender, plum, and emerald green.
Never use the colors: Orange and earth tone generally do not favor you.
Skin: Gold and / or dark brown clear or brown. Some redheads fall into this group. You can also find anyone in black or blond hair is golden autumn.
Eyes: Brown, hazel, green or blue or hazel.
Hair: Brown or red with golden highlights.
Your colors: earth tones; beige, orange, gold or dark brown are for you.
Never use the colors: White and black, will make you look tired. Nor views with pastel colors.
Skin: Cream or ivory, peach and pink or yellow; sub-cutaneous tone gold. They tend to have freckles.
Your colors: Soft as peach, golden yellow, golden brown, ivory, Verdez and light blue. Some red also help you fine.
Never use the colors: Dark, muted tone as dark gray or black.

How many body types are there?
Technically we discuss three main types: mesomorph, endomorph and ectomorph.
In the first point we talk about people with broad shoulders and narrow waist, in the second case are referred to people with a rounder figure and in the third the proportion is straighter.
This silhouette is characterized by the wider than the hips. Usually the body that develop debit swimmers to develop all the exercise.
The ideal is to divert attention from the shoulders and highlight the hips and legs.
The star items are those with volume at the bottom like skirts or dresses with flight. If further colors used will be a perception of greater size and ratio in that area.
Hip belts also work well, like the necks of peak. The flares are another of the garments that suit this kind of women and jackets must reach the height of the hips, not the waist.
This is the body where the shoulders and hips measure the same, with well-defined waist.

Maybe if you have this formología, it is to promote garments that follow the line of the body. Tight garments that adhere to the body like a second skin, even if you have a few extra pounds do not need to be reached that point.
It’s a good idea to use belts that mark the waist, since the waist is one of the strengths of these bodies. It is preferable that seat, that if are not too wide, as could cause the opposite effect.
This body has no angular lines and shoulders are round, waist is not defined.
Monochromatic looks are part of our allies.
We escape the large prints. Dark colors such as black, brown, burgundy, dark green ... We also favored.
We do not Encourage excessive very tight clothes, but beware, esta Because We Should does not mean wear clothes super-wide, vaporous, etc because we’d get the opposite effect.
The best pants are the straight ones, no cigarettes or elephant leg. On the other hand, t-shirts or dresses V-neck will also stylize the figure.

It is the body where the hips, shoulders and waist are aligned. The secret to dress this body shape is to create curves with soft fabrics and feminine lines, with overlapping fabrics and angular details.

We must emphasize the bust with some accessories or clothes that draw attention to the upper body, give volume, so look away from the weaknesses. Better use shirts or dresses with cleavage, either in V as round, since the absence of this, also emphasize the lack of curves.
Another thing you can not miss in your closet are belts, to help you define your waist and seem to have a curvier silhouette.
This Body shape has the upper smaller than the bottom, these bodies can be defined or waist and legs are generally little stylized.
We highlight the upper part of the body and causing the optical effect of widening the shoulders. The stripes can be our partner, because horizontal stripes "widen".
Avoid the hip belt and any type of accessory, printing or flyer that goes directly to the hip area, since any volume in this part of the body we "widen" further this part of the body.
Pants that we will be better sit straight.
A great tip is, to focus attention to the upper body is preferred in this light-colored and dark colored bottom.
We refer to the type of body that is naturally muscular or athletic. V-shaped, usually broad shoulders and narrow waist.
To not be very disproportionate, your main goal should be to find the balance between your shoulders and waist.

In jerseys, shirts or jackets, the neck feel great because it gives very good visual sense and balances the upper torso. Just do not abuse the clothes too tight. The most flattering pants will be visible straight cut with pockets on the hips to provide more in the sense of trying to balance.
Endomorph body is synonymous with the type of person who tends to gain weight and has the features the widest waist, higher density and tips that are commonly a shorter size.
We must base our outfits in straight vertical lines, careful cuts and long jackets as both hunter ...
We must not add layers or volumes as with ectomorphs. When we talk about the pants, the most successful will be those that provide high-waisted we linearity.
These type of bodies are naturally thin and usually has little muscular structure.

If you want to conceal the thinness perhaps a plus would be playing with the volumes in your clothes. Large pockets on jackets and coats with abuse: shirts, jackets, cardigans will also come in handy in that corpulence increase.

Closfy team is formed by fashion consultants specialized in online counseling.

Do you have an important event and you don’t know what to wear or you don’t know where you can find what you have in mind? Please contact us for a quote. You will receive feedback from our stylists in maximum 48 hours. Support in Spanish and English
You must enter a valid email address.
There was an error sending the email, please try again later.
The email has been sent successfully.
You must edit this outfit to create the image
Closfy team is formed by fashion stylists who have extensive experience in online counseling for men, women and children, therefore, they will be happy to assist you.
Applications will be attended only in Spanish or English.
If you have any questions about the service, please contact us at the following address:
Closfy offers two types of fashion advice service for men and Women:

- Advice for an event: If you have a special occasion and you don´t know what to wear, you can hire our service. The styling team will contact you to know the details needed for counseling, as well as their purchasing budget. In the range of 72h it will be sent a full dossier which includes four wardrobe choices, plus guidance on hair and makeup.
Therefore, to suggest such advice is requested with the minimum of one week before the date that the final result of the advice needed.

- Casual advice: If you have problems when dressing in their daily activities, the Closfy Team will study your needs and lifestyle. In the range of 72h they will send you a full dossier in which you will get different combinations of costumes, as well as a wardrobe "must have" and tips on how to multiply your looks.
During any fashion advice, the client will be in constant and personal contact with the stylists.
We give you the opportunity to purchase packages of fashion advice, which can be used as you want, because they have no expiration. Packages are available in format of 3 and 5 assessments.
- The fashion advice will be only assisted in Spanish and English.
- Closfy team is committed to answer the email application advice up to 48h.
- Closfy team agrees that once started counseling, will send the dossier clothing in a range of 72h.
- Considering the above deadlines, the responsibility of ask the advice in good time belongs to the customer. Closfy doesn´t make refunds if the event date is prior to the margins marked.
- It is the sole responsibility of the customer to provide a valid email address to Closfy. Otherwise we are not responsible for the inability to get in touch with you to give you the advice.

- In case you have to delete the application or if you change the device, we recommend contacting us previously to not lose the acquired advice. The assessments are stored in the device, so if you don´t inform us in advance, it can´t be recovered.
- By buying our products, you agree to our terms and conditions. Any returns involving any of the cases described above will not be performed.
